Header: Death row running out of room?
Content: The Prisons Department says that there are 1,050 persons who are on death row in in the countryâ€™s prisons. Speaking to News1st, Prisons Commissioner General Rohana Pushpakumara said that at present there were also 9,700 prison inmates who had been accused of being involved in drug-related offences. This was 34% of the total number of inmates in prison. It was further noted that 22% of total prison inmates were those accused of drug-related offences. The Prisons Commissioner General said that the prisons in the country were becoming congested as a result.
